Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Eurostars Grand Marina places you in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Rambla de Mar and Columbus Monument. This 5-star hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 273 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a sauna, a fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a sauna, a fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 273 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at Eurostars Grand Marina places you in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Rambla de Mar and Columbus Monument. This 5-star hotel is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana and Casa Batllo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Rambla de Mar - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Columbus Monument - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Maritime Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Barcelona Aquarium - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Barcelona Wax Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Centre d'Art Santa Monica - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Maremagnum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
San Sebastian Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Teatre Principal - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Port Vell - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Palau Guell - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Victoria Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Placa Reial - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sant Pau del Camp - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Filmoteca de Catalunya - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Eurostars Grand Marina is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.5 km / 7.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Eurostars Grand Marina is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 11.5 km / 7.2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
ROMANTIC SUPPLEMENT THE HOTEL OFFERS THE POSSIBILITY OF BOOKING A ROMANTIC NIGHT WITH EXTRA CHARGESUPPLEMENT OF 50 EUROS PLUS VAT ON DOUBLE CHARGE, INCLUDES: ACCOMMODATION IN DOUBLE DELUXE, WELCOME DRINK, STRAWBERRIES WITH CHOCOLATE, BOTTLE OF CAVA IN THE ROOM THE FIRST NIGHT AND BUFFET BREAKFAST. ( SUPPLEMENT PER NIGHT AND ROOM)

SUPLEMENTO ROMATICO EL HOTEL OFRECE LA POSIBILIDAD DE RESERVAR UNA NOCHE ROMANTICA PAGANDO UN SUPLEMENTO. SUPLEMENTO DE 50 EUROS MAS IVA SOBRE LA DOBLE, ESTE SUPLEMENTO INCLUYE: ALOJAMIENTO EN DOBLE DELUXE, COPA DE BIENVENIDA, FRESAS CON CHOCOLATE, BOTELLA DE CAVA EN LA HABITACION LA PRIMERA NOCHE DE ESTANCIA Y DESAYUNO BUFF (Suplemento por noche y habitaci¢n).

NOTA INFORMATIVA: EL HOTEL PUEDE COMPROBAR LA VALIDEZ DE LA TARJETA DE CREDITOINFORMATION NOTE: The Hotel can check the validity of the credit card

- FAMILY SUITE: 2 adults and 2 children: 50m2 room (king or two double beds), bathroom with tub and separate shower cabin . Dressing room and a small livingroom.BCN views guaranteed, 2 rooms are separated (RI) - SUITE FAMILIAR: para 2 adultos y 2 ni¿os: hab de 50m2 (king matrimonial o 2 camas), ba¿o con hidromasaje y cabina de ducha separada. Vestidor y un peque¿o salon. Vistas a BCN garantizadas, las 2hab estan separadas (RI)

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

Message.Text:
Room 1
Check in time: 2pm Check out time: 12pm If you plan to arrive after 8pm, please advise the hotel.
Notice
The Eurostars Grand Marina provides its guests with an outdoor swimming pool available in summer.


The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.

RoomType.text: Superior Room + Free Wifi

Room 1
Check in time: 2pm Check out time: 12pm If you plan to arrive after 8pm, please advise the hotel.
Notice
The Eurostars Grand Marina provides its guests with an outdoor swimming pool available in summer.


The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.

RoomType.text: Superior Room + Free Wifi
